mapper.select: select board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_writer as boardWriter, readCount, regDate, priority, fileName, filePath, ncCount from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (SELECT * FROM board order by 1 desc)b) board where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_writer as boardWriter, readCount, regDate, priority, fileName, filePath, ncCount from board where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board set readCount=readCount+1 where board_no=#{boardNo}
update board set board_title=#{boardTitle}, board_content=#{boardContent} where board_no=#{boardNo}
